Namespace DUKE.UI

Classes

BuildingDrawerUI

Display BuildingDrawer's generated data numerically.

Generate a curved plane that works as a base for curved UI elements.

Enable curving of an UI element that uses Image or TextMeshProUGUI component to render onto a canvas. Curved

CurvedUIElement_editor

Graph

Base class for different Graphs.

GraphArea

Defines the area in which a data set will be displayed. Creates a set of DataPoints with which data can be displayed on the curved plane.

GraphArea_editor

Custom inspector for GraphArea.

GraphDataset

Data form for Graph visualisation.

LinkSO

Function as a dummy object and link UnityEvents to static (Singleton) classes' methods.

UISettingsElement

UISettingsProvider

Add to an UI element to define the visual aspects of its children.

ZoneMap

Quad

Store quad information to help in mesh subdivision.

RectInfo

Store information of Rect and RectTransform, and compare them to figure out if the object requires updating.
